I am Assistant Senior Instructional Professor in Computational Social Science & the College at the University of Chicago, and Associate Director of the [Masters in Computational Social Science](https://macss.uchicago.edu). I teach learners social scientific research design, computational modeling, data science, math/statistics, and data visualization.

## Experience

##### University of Chicago

* Assistant Senior Instructional Professor of Computational Social Science & the College (2021-present)
* Associate Director, [Masters in Computational Social Science](https://macss.uchicago.edu/) (2021-present)
* Assistant Instructional Professor of Computational Social Science (2016-2021)
* Assistant Director, [Masters in Computational Social Science](https://macss.uchicago.edu/) (2019-2021)

##### Miami University

* Visiting Assistant Professor, [Department of Political Science](http://miamioh.edu/cas/academics/departments/political-science/index.html) (2015-2016)

* PhD, Political Science, [The Pennsylvania State University](http://polisci.la.psu.edu/), 2015
